title: Hello, I’m Tony!
content: Hello, I’m Tony!I’m a seasoned UX Designer & Design Lead, passionate about crafting product and service experiences that simplify tasks, clarify information, and feel delightful to use. With over 20 years of experience, I’ve delivered seamless digital solutions for global brands and everyday users alike. I’m guided by user needs, and a user-centered approach. I bridge design and engineering by rapidly translating ideas into working code. Using tools like Claude Code, Cursor, and modern design systems, I “vibe code” end-to-end flows that can be tested, iterated, and shipped quickly, ensuring real user feedback drives constant improvement.This site is intentionally minimal to make the work below the focus. Hope you have fun exploring.
htmlContent:
Hello, I’m Tony!

I’m a seasoned UX Designer & Design Lead, passionate about crafting product and service experiences that simplify tasks, clarify information, and feel delightful to use. With over 20 years of experience, I’ve delivered seamless digital solutions for global brands and everyday users alike. I’m guided by user needs, and a user-centered approach. I bridge design and engineering by rapidly translating ideas into working code. Using tools like Claude Code, Cursor, and modern design systems, I “vibe code” end-to-end flows that can be tested, iterated, and shipped quickly, ensuring real user feedback drives constant improvement.

This site is intentionally minimal to make the work below the focus. Hope you have fun exploring.

images.context: Users can create AI generated visualizations
Users upload data
They set context using their preferred language
And generate a beautiful dashboard driven by AI. The app can be themed, charts edited, and added to be published and shared

images.alt: Configured Custom Dashboard  Example of a fully configured dashboard where a business has set up a variety of ways of consuming data
Dashboard List  A list of custom created dashboards that can be shared and reviewed at any time
Adding Metrics Card to a Dashboard  Screen where the user chooses the type of metrics card to add to a dashboard
Dashboard Management  Example for of a dashboard management task
Online Inventory Management   Centralized experience that syncs product information  and stock numbers between back of house, and point of sale.
Point of Sale Employee Experience  The service view of inventory and sales actions on tablet.
Customer Targeted Suggestions  Employee can suggest product offerings based on customer history and preferences
Loyalty   Employees can see customer loyalty accumulation, and suggest redemption
Invoice Management  Customer history can be retrieved for returns and verification at the point of sale and also in the back of house system
Configured Custom Dashboard  Example of a fully configured dashboard where a business has set up a variety of ways of consuming data
Online Inventory Management   Centralized experience that syncs product information  and stock numbers between back of house, and point of sale.

images.context:
Travel Sask - Design Component Summary 
This is a summary of component configurations that can be used on any page within the website

Travel Sask - Targeted Content 
Using user types we gave different types of travel business owners the ability to filter content specific to their type of business.

Travel Sask - Fishing Site
Using reusable components from the business hub (story to the right), the same system could be applied to many other sites.

Bow Valley College 
Component driven redesign / navigation redesign

images.alt: Online Inventory Management   Centralized experience that syncs product information  and stock numbers between back of house, and point of sale.
Point of Sale Employee Experience  The service view of inventory and sales actions on tablet.
Customer Targeted Suggestions  Employee can suggest product offerings based on customer history and preferences
Loyalty   Employees can see customer loyalty accumulation, and suggest redemption
Invoice Management  Customer history can be retrieved for returns and verification at the point of sale and also in the back of house system
Configured Custom Dashboard  Example of a fully configured dashboard where a business has set up a variety of ways of consuming data
Online Inventory Management   Centralized experience that syncs product information  and stock numbers between back of house, and point of sale.

images.context:
Design Pattern Library
Created and maintained a design pattern library to ensure the development team, and company at large understands how all pages should look and behave.

Field Ticket Reporting
As events happen out in the field in trucks, it is sent back to the head office where all the events are summarized, and the service can be billed out and seen by each party.

images.context: Queue Screen

Customer Profiles
Customer information could be easily be accesses by scanning ID or searching. Required legal documents could are attached to the profile, and the screen warns of expiries or issues

Consultation Screen
Whilst consulting a customer, notes can be taken for future consultations

HUB View
Customer information is also stored in real time in the HUB web application for reporting and quick access in the back of house on a desktop

Using tools like Claude Code, Cursor, and modern design systems, I “vibe code” end-to-end flows that can be tested, iterated, and shipped quickly, ensuring real user feedback drives constant improvement.

This site is intentionally minimal to make the work below the focus. Hope you have fun exploring.
